Literature.Title: Discovery of antimicrobial peptides with notable antibacterial potency by an LLM-based foundation model
Literature.Author: Wang J, Feng J, Kang Y, Pan P, Ge J, Wang Y, Wang M, Wu Z, Zhang X, Yu J, Wang T, Wen L, Yan G, Deng Y, Shi H, Hsieh CY, Jiang Z, Hou T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Cutibacterium acnes ATCC 6919(MIC=32µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes ATCC 11827(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml)
